00043 // Sortie

00045 //
00046 //! Classe de definition des operateurs et methodes pour toute lecture dans un flot d'entree<br>(fichier, clavier, tampon de communication, etc)
00047 //
00048 
00049 class Entree
00050 {
00051 public:
00052 // Constructeurs
00053   Entree();
00054   Entree(istream& is);
00055   Entree(const Entree& is);
00056 
00057 // Operateurs d'affectation
00058   Entree& operator=(istream& is);
00059   Entree& operator=(Entree& is);
00060 
00061   virtual istream& get_istream();
00062   virtual const istream& get_istream() const;
00063   void set_istream(istream* is);
00064 
00065   Entree& operator >>(Entree& (*f)(Entree&));
00066   Entree& operator >>(istream& (*f)(istream&));
00067   Entree& operator >>(ios& (*f)(ios&));
00068 
00069   virtual Entree& operator>>(int&      ob);
00070 #ifndef INT_is_64_
00071   virtual Entree& operator>>(long&     ob);
00072 #endif
00073   virtual Entree& operator>>(float&    ob);
00074   virtual Entree& operator>>(double&   ob);
00075 
00076   virtual int get(int* ob, int n);
00077 #ifndef INT_is_64_
00078   virtual int get(long* ob, int n);
00079 #endif
00080   virtual int get(float* ob, int n);
00081   virtual int get(double* ob, int n);
00082   virtual int get(char * buf, int bufsize);
00083 
00084   virtual int eof();
00085   virtual int fail();
00086   virtual int good();
00087   virtual ~Entree();
00088   virtual int set_bin(int bin);
00089   int         is_bin() const;
00090   virtual void   set_check_types(int flag);
00091   int         check_types() const;
00092   enum Error_Action { ERROR_EXIT, ERROR_CONTINUE, ERROR_EXCEPTION };
00093   virtual void   set_error_action(Error_Action);
00094   Error_Action   get_error_action();
00095 
00096   inline operator istream& ()
00097   {
00098     return get_istream();
00099   }   ;
00100   inline istream& putback(char ch)
00101   {
00102     return get_istream().putback(ch);
00103   };
00104   inline istream& ignore(int n=1,int delim=EOF)
00105   {
00106     return get_istream().ignore(n,delim);
00107   };
00108 
00109   virtual void set_diffuse(int diffuse);
00110   inline int get_diffuse()
00111   {
00112     return diffuse_;
00113   };
00114 
00115 protected:
00116   inline int error_handle(int fail_flag);
00117   virtual int error_handle_(int fail_flag);
00118   int bin_;
00119   bool is_different_int_size_; //!< File with int32 (or int64) whereas version is int64 (or int32à
00120   int check_types_;
00121   Error_Action error_action_;
00122   int diffuse_; //!< By default 1, but some child classes (eg: LecFicDiffuse) could set temporary to 0 to not diffuse to other processes
00123 private:
00124   istream* istream_;
00125 };
00126 
00127 //
00128 //! methode inline pour traiter rapidement le cas trivial.<br>Sinon, appel a la methode virtuelle error_handle_()
00129 inline int Entree::error_handle(int fail_flag)
00130 {
00131   if (!fail_flag)
00132     return 1;
00133   else
00134     return error_handle_(fail_flag);
00135 }
